snippet: The United Nations refugee agency said that the number of Syrian refugees accepted for resettlement would more than double as a result of commitments given by governments at a conference in Geneva.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency says number of Syrian refugees accepted for resettlement will more than double as a result of commitments given by governments at a conference in Geneva.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency said that the number of Syrian refugees accepted for resettlement would more than double as a result of commitments given by governments at a conference in Geneva.

headline.main: More Nations Pledge to U.N. to Resettle Syrian Refugees
headline.print_headline: More Nations Pledge to U.N. to Resettle Syrian Refugees
